description: This is a Python source file for a Streamlit web application that provides a GitHub repository analyzer interface. It initializes a GitHub agent, manages session state, loads previous conversation history, and handles user interactions to analyze repositories with visual output.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents the GitHub agent used to interact with GitHub repositories.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that sets up the Streamlit app, manages session state, loads previous data, and handles user interactions.
